LanguageData.Concrete.label: concrete
LanguageData.Concrete.description: Rough concrete. It is fast to walk on, cheap, and quick to build, but quite ugly.
LanguageData.GoldTile.label: gold tile
LanguageData.GoldTile.description: For overbearing extravagance, nothing beats gold tiles. They are exceptionally expensive, and exceptionally beautiful, and people will think you're exceptionally snobbish if you actually live on them.
LanguageData.MetalTile.label: metal tile
LanguageData.MetalTile.description: Metal tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.
LanguageData.PavedTile.label: paved tile
LanguageData.PavedTile.description: Concrete tiles. Cheap and quick to move around on, but neutral in terms of looks and slow to build.
LanguageData.SilverTile.label: silver tile
LanguageData.SilverTile.description: For a futuristic but royal look, silver tiles fit perfectly into luxurious rooms. They get a bonus to cleanliness.
LanguageData.SterileTile.label: sterile tile
LanguageData.SterileTile.description: Sterile tiles with special cleanliness-enhancing properties. Extra-clean rooms improve outcomes in hospitals and research labs. This tile is very slow to build.
LanguageData.StrawMatting.label: TODO
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor.label: wood floor
LanguageData.WoodPlankFloor.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
